page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF DOMINIC
page.content: This is a day in the school holidays First I get up and get dressed,then I go down stairs and have breakfast. For breakfast I have Kellogs Start.Then I go back up stairs and have a wash and clean my teeth.Then I go back down stairs and put my daps and coat on then I go down and call for Craig and Marcus .When they come out we go up Cricket and call for Anthony , and other times we make camps.Then we go in for our dinner. After dinner we go down Neils house and play in his bedroom or in his garden and play war .Then we go home and have tea .After tea I go on the computer and watch T.V. I go to bed at half past nine.
